title.value: Extension UK Core Document Reference Version

description.value: To allow the addition of a version for the document that is being referenced.

purpose.value: This is a use case from National Imaaging Registry and DHCW

short.value: An explicitly assigned identifer of a variation of the content in the DocumentReference

definition.value: An explicitly assigned identifer of a variation of the content in the DocumentReference.

comment.value: While each resource, including the DocumentReference itself, has its own version identifier, this is a formal identifier for the logical version of the DocumentReference as a whole. It would remain constant if the resources were moved to a new server, and all got new individual resource versions, for example.
